content: don t stuff 1 2 3 4 gather the outside loop of pin into row 18-20 centered work the yarn tail through the work all the way around then each of the 14 stitches and pull on the body nearby stitches in the body and knot off and weave in the tight stitches in the last gathered ends row done © 2019 valerie church | www oldsoulcrochetco com @oldsoulcrochetco www facebook com/oldsoulcrochetco 10
